ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectSmart Net Systems Ltd. Remission Order
PrecisOrder remitting tax, payable by SMART NET SYSTEMS LTD. for the period beginning on February 1, 2010 and ending on April 30, 2011 due to incorrect action on the part of the Canada Revenue Agency.
